channel.title: Any known problem OFTC-Chat (irc.oftc.net) over Tor (using Whonix 10.0.0.5.5)?
channel.description:
Is any known problem on OFTC-Chat?
Since Thursday the last week I am having connectivity problem with the OFTC chat-service over Tor (using Whonix 10.0.0.5.5): It worked fine till Wednesday.
[b]irc.oftc.net/6697[/b]
and/or
[b]irc.oftc.net/9999[/b]
both do not work any longer.
Please any known reason?

item.title: Any known problem OFTC-Chat (irc.oftc.net) over Tor (using Whonix 10.0.0.5.5)?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Itâ€™s a known problem. We need to find another IRC network, that is Tor friendly.
https://phabricator.whonix.org/T361

Read full topic
item.source: Any known problem OFTC-Chat (irc.oftc.net) over Tor (using Whonix 10.0.0.5.5)?
